example.eg: Jeremy heard the blackbird's distinct call.
example.egtrans: 杰里米听到了黑鸟不同的叫声。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 有区别的, 不同的, 不同种类的

example.eg: If you look closely, you can see that this plant is distinct from that one.
example.egtrans: 如果仔细观察，你就能看到，这株植物和那株不同。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 不同于...的, 与...有区别的

example.eg: Eugene could make out the distinct shape of a molehill on the lawn.
example.egtrans: 尤金能够清楚的看到，草坪上有个鼹鼠丘。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 明显的, 能清楚地看到（听到）的

example.eg: There was a distinct lack of enthusiasm among the students when the teacher suggested they do extra homework.
example.egtrans: 当老师提出增加额外的家庭作业时，学生中显然缺乏热情。

example.eg: Agatha likes to keep her work and her home life distinct.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 完全分开的, 相互独立的

example.eg: Agatha likes to keep her work distinct from her home life.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 与...完全分开的, 与...相互独立的
